issue.title: [CF 75] Stay dim while on CD and no power
issue.body:
What is the enhancement in mind? How should it look and feel?

When I set a cooldown spell icon to a) 'always show' with say a 50% alpha when unusable AND b) have power check enabled, it actually goes completely invisible if no power.

I would like the icon when it is on CD and has insufficient power to still stay visible albeit dimmed at the 50% alpha. Can you help?


> Posted by CurseForge user Mantooth555 | Imported from CurseForge issue #75 | Raw

comments.body:
You have your settings set to completely hide an icon when you have no power. Go into the Blizzard interface options panel -> Addons tab -> TellMeWhen -> Main Options -> Colors

to customize the color/alpha.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
